Class ResourceWindowListener

java.lang.Object

      com.twiddles.ganesha.gui.ResourceWindowListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.InternalFrameListener
class ResourceWindowListener
extends javax.swing.event.InternalFrameAdapter

ActionListener to control the exit behaviour of a Resource window.

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a Listener that is linked to a given Resource list entry.
